divs: sighting details while driving south along a country road at 2:14pm i noticed a white object floating in an easterly direction. it appeared to be about 3\4 of a mile from me. the object was all white with no features. no windows, no wings or tail structure, no crew cabin beneath it like a blimp would have. as a private pilot i am used to seeing all sorts of aircraft including helicopters since sykorsky builds them nearby. it looked kind of like a white mushroom cap. i took a side street to get closer and it went behind a line of trees then floated back into sight for a few more seconds before it went behind some more trees and i lost it for good. i was going to call the local police to ask if anyone else had seen it but decided not to. i didn't want to bother them. i'd like to see this object again and maybe video record it.
Summary: White disk-like object observed heading Easterly in broad daylight.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Orange
There were no other sightings in Orange on or around November 5th 2011
